title: r/AmITheA**hole For Refusing To Let My Neighbor Steal From Me?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP has a new neighbor move in next to him. For some reason, this woman gets it in her head that OP's private property is actually public property. She sneaks into OP's backyard and steals vegetables from his garden. When OP catches her, does she feel shame and apologize? Of course not! She argues that she has a right to steal from him, because of course the world revolves around her.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
